content.rendered: The sport of sailing offers some of the most spectacular venues anywhere. With a coastal location a necessity, the destination is often as big of a draw as the race itself. Speed, skill, and strategy are all part of what makes this thrilling sport so exciting. With viewing options on land and on water, there are plenty of ways to catch the fast-paced action at the sport’s biggest events, like the America’s Cup. Roadtrips’ custom packages give you the option to create your perfect sailing experience including luxury hotels, prime viewing, and VIP hospitality options.
